title: How fans talk about their passions

vocabItems.definition: sharing similar opinions, ideas or interests
odd or unusual, but in an attractive and interesting way
insult someone by laughing at them in an unkind way

vocabItems.word: BIRGing (short for Basking in Reflected Glory)
vocabItems.definition: feeling good about yourself when the team you support wins

vocabItems.word: a piece/a slice of the action
vocabItems.definition: taking part in a celebration or other exciting group activity

vocabItems.word: CORFing (short for Cutting off Reflected Failure)
vocabItems.definition: distancing yourself from the team you support when they lose
